model.projectile



class Projectile: model.circular_unit.CircularUnit;
This class is inherited from a circular unit and describes a projectile.

immutable ProjectileType type;
Returns:
the type of the projectile.

immutable long ownerUnitId;
Returns:
the id of the unit created this projectile.

immutable long ownerPlayerId;
Returns:
the id of the player, which unit created this projectile, or 
-1
.
